gui.components.macro
Class GraphArea_

java.lang.Object
  gui.components.Component_

          gui.components.rectangles.ComponentContainer_
              gui.components.macro.GraphArea_
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component_I, Zoomable_I
Direct Known Subclasses:
GanttGraphArea_, GeoGraphArea
public abstract class GraphArea_
extends ComponentContainer_
implements Zoomable_I

ComponentContainer that represents the drawing area of a graph it includes rows gridlines and content (tasks, points, polygons...)
